description: Erection of a part single, part two storey side, part single part first floor rear extension and a new front porch
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [ART/2024/WA649GWR/EL, ART/2024/WA649GWR/EE, received 25/01/2024, ART/2024/WA649GWR/SPLP/Rev.B, ART/2024/WA649GWR/PL/Rev.B, ART/2024/WA649GWR/RL/Rev.B, ART/2024/WA649GWR/PE/Rev.B received 08/04/2024].

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Condition : 4 - No additional windows or openings shall be formed in the [insert] elevation of the development hereby permitted.

Condition : 5 - The windows formed in the Eastern elevation shall be obscure-glazed and non-opening below 1.7 metres above internal floor level. The windows shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than in accordance with the requirements of this condition.
